title: The Best Couple
overview: In the neon-lit alleys, the Renxin Clinic is known for its cold-hearted and money-driven underground doctor, Mu Wan. But behind the façade lies a five-year plan, which her true target is the Dark Empire's heir, Ma Yuting. When he stumbles in, seriously wounded, her deadly game begins. Yet he has long seen through her revenge plot. Between manipulation and temptation, two powerful predators engage in a fierce game of strategy and seduction. Passion ignites in their deadly confrontation. Not only is she his fate, but also the inescapable doom he cannot avoid…
